Package mastodon

Interface Summary
FileDrop.Listener Implement this inner interface to listen for when files are dropped.
FileDrop.TransferableObject.Fetcher Instead of passing your data directly to the FileDrop.TransferableObject constructor, you may want to know exactly when your data was received in case you need to remove it from its source (or do anyting else to it).
MastodonFileMenuHandler  
MastodonPruneMenuHandler  
 

Class Summary
AlgorithmDialog This class creates a dialog that the user can interact with to setup a pruning algorithm.
FigTreePanel This is a panel that has a TreeViewer and a BasicControlPalette with the default Controllers and Painters.
FileDrop This class makes it easy to drag and drop files from the operating system to a Java program.
FileDrop.Event This is the event that is passed to the filesDropped(...) method in your FileDropListener when files are dropped onto a registered drop target.
FileDrop.TransferableObject At last an easy way to encapsulate your custom objects for dragging and dropping in your Java programs!
GeneralPreferencesSection  
ImportFileDialog A dialog for getting user input about burnin and rooting options.
LabelPainterController  
MastodonApp This is the main entry point to the MASTadon graphical application.
MastodonDefaultFileMenuFactory  
MastodonDefaultPruneMenuFactory  
MastodonFrame This is the Grand Central of the app.
MastodonMacFileMenuFactory  
MastodonMenuBarFactory  
SimpleControlPalette  
SimpleLabelPainter A simple implementation of LabelPainter that can be used to display tip, node or branch labels.
SimpleTreeViewer A panel that displays correlation plots of 2 traces
TopToolbar This is the toolbar found above the tree viewing panel.
TreeAppearanceController  
TreeColouringController  
TreeLayoutController  
TreesController  
TreeViewerController  
 

Enum Summary
FigTreePanel.Style  
SimpleLabelPainter.PainterIntent
